languages.text: {n}Сервитор делает полшага назад и склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Ты вносишь диссонанс. Но мы не понимаем, почему. Мы не хотим пока говорить больше — мы должны очиститься, осмыслить, понять".

{n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор делает полшага назад и склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Ты вносишь диссонанс. Но мы не понимаем, почему. Мы не хотим пока говорить больше — мы должны очиститься, осмыслить, понять".

{n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

languages.text: {n}Le servitor recule d'un pas et penche la tête.{/n} « Ce que vous dites est dissonant, mais nous ne comprenons pas pourquoi. Nous ne souhaitons plus parler pour l'heure... Nous devons recommencer, réfléchir, comprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor recule d'un pas et penche la tête.{/n} « Ce que vous dites est dissonant, mais nous ne comprenons pas pourquoi. Nous ne souhaitons plus parler pour l'heure... Nous devons recommencer, réfléchir, comprendre. »

languages.text: {n}机仆退了半步，侧过了头。{/n}“你带来了不谐。我们不理解为什么，但我们现在不打算再说什么了。我们需要重新开始，反思，理解。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工退了半步，侧过了头。{/n}“你带来了不谐。我们不理解为什么，但我们现在不打算再说什么了。我们需要重新开始，反思，理解。”

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor tritt einen halben Schritt von dir weg und legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "Ihr bringt Dissonanz hinein. Doch wir verstehen nicht warum. Wir möchten nun nicht mehr sprechen. Wir müssen neu anfangen, reflektieren, verstehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor tritt einen halben Schritt von dir weg und legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "Ihr bringt Dissonanz hinein. Doch wir verstehen nicht warum. Wir möchten nun nicht mehr sprechen. Wir müssen neu anfangen, reflektieren, verstehen."

languages.text: {n}El servidor se aleja medio paso de ti y ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Produces disonancias. Pero no sabemos por qué. No queremos hablar más contigo por ahora. Debemos empezar de nuevo, reflexionar y entender».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor se aleja medio paso de ti y ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Produces disonancias. Pero no sabemos por qué. No queremos hablar más contigo por ahora. Debemos empezar de nuevo, reflexionar y entender».

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターはこちらから半歩離れ、首を傾げた。{/n}「あなたは不協和音をもたらす。しかし、私たちにはその理由がわからない。今はこれ以上話したくない。もう一度やり直し、内省し、理解する必要がある」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターはこちらから半歩離れ、首を傾げた。{/n}「あなたは不協和音をもたらす。しかし、私たちにはその理由がわからない。今はこれ以上話したくない。もう一度やり直し、内省し、理解する必要がある」

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, senden yarım adım uzaklaşıp başını eğiyor.{/n} "Uyumsuzluk çıkarıyorsunuz. Nedenini anlamıyoruz. Şimdilik daha fazla konuşmak istemiyoruz. Yeniden başlamamız, düşünmemiz, anlamamız gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor takes half a step away from you and tilts its head.{/n} "You bring in dissonance. But we do not understand why. We do not want to speak any more for now. We need to start over, reflect, understand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör, senden yarım adım uzaklaşıp başını eğiyor.{/n} "Uyumsuzluk çıkarıyorsunuz ama nedenini anlamıyoruz. Şimdilik daha fazla konuşmak istemiyoruz. Yeniden başlamamız, düşünmemiz, anlamamız gerekiyor."
